comment: TRM. TRAKER

title: It works!
comment: Easy to use.  Gives me the next few trams, which the other app doesn't.
Simple and work well

title: Probably good if you know the area
comment: Been 30 years since I caught a tram. What I want is. I have a given tram stop Nmbr. I need to get off one stop before that. What's that stop No? Doesn't show on map. Now I have GPS enabled, so show me nearest boarding point. Nope. Can't do that either on this app.

title: Best tram app for Melbourne!
comment: Love it, works great.

title: Lost 22 march event in Melbourne
comment: Right now the stops in Melbourne CBD are closed but your app shows trams are coming!!!!
Handy and simple

title: Free and excellent
comment: I now have Train Trapper and this.. Wonderful.. :D

title: The original and best
comment: Early adopters of Android only had this app to use for years before yarra trams finally made an android port of their app. This one works just as well and is less cluttered.

title: Even better!!!
comment: My preferred tram app that has got better and better. Simple and easy to use. Love it.
Yeah, the special event message popup wasn't a great idea. Try the latest version, the message is subtly displayed at the bottom of the screen now.

title: Better than tramTRACKER
comment: You can see ALL coming trams immediately in chronological order and you can manage your favourite list very easily. Great job! But it would be even better if you could group your favourites like in tramTRACKER

I love a conspiracy theory as much as the next guy, but the truth is that I was using Yarra Trams' old web service for results. You can enable the JSON API in the settings of the latest version for super quick results.
Not bad

title: No Map
comment: Would be so much easier if there was a live map (not just a network map) with GPS positioning and public transport icons. Other versions have this feature but lack the easy bookmarking ability.

title: Bring back quotes
comment: Please please please bring back the quotes.  They made waiting for the tram bearable

title: Time's out of whack
comment: Pretty good, but sometimes it'll say a tram is a minute away for 10 minutes until it actually shows up

title: Wow
comment: Simple and awesome.

title: Indispensible
comment: We need this for Melbourne's buses as well. Unlike the trams, buses tend to go AWOL and one waits 30 mins for the next one. These real time trackers tend to keep the drivers honest.

title: Something happened!
comment: The app is only showing me now or next day services, and it's 10am! No help...

title: Very friendly user surface .easy to use
comment: .very fast. Very professional software. After updated, it does not work any more. I uninstalled your app and give you one star.

title: Excellent app
comment: By a top guy.

title: Back to its old self, great to see!
comment: Must have for Melbournians!  New JSON API option seems to have resolved performance issues, great return to form... Lucky this got fixed, none of the other tram apps were ever really any good. :)

Hi Jay,
There was an issue with the Yarra Trams web service during May, not a fault with Tram Hunter. I've added support to enable the JSON API (used by the Tram Tracker app on Android) which should perform much better. You can enable it in the settings of the new v1.4 of Tram Hunter. You should reconsider your one star rating :)
cheers,
Andy
Better than the official app

title: Amazing, so fast
comment: The original and best Android tram app. The new JSON API makes queries super fast.

title: Don't leave home without it
comment: Nuff said

title: Need no other
comment: Need no other tram app for Melbourne.  Great, simple, responsive, and it delvers just the info you need to get around

title: Nice app
comment: 5 stars
Try the latest version. You might be pleasantly surprised.

title: Brilliant Again
comment: Seems to be working again. Much more accurate than Yarra trams

Hi Joshua,
There was an issue with the Yarra Trams web service during May. I've now added support to enable the JSON API (used by the Tram Tracker app on Android) which should perform much better. You can enable it in the settings in the new v1.4 of Tram Hunter.
cheers,
Andy

Hi Sam,
Looks like it's time to change that rating! 
There was an issue with the Yarra Trams web service during May, which caused the issue. I've added support to enable the JSON API (used by the Tram Tracker app on Android) which should perform much better. You can enable it in the settings of the new v1.4 of Tram Hunter.
cheers,
Andy

title: Was great
comment: Originally switched from tram tracker as tram hunter was much faster. Like others mention, lately won't load anything most of the time or is so slow I give up. Another poor feature is the reloading the results when the screen orientation changes.

title: No longer works
comment: Used to work was great, no longer useful an now uninstalled.
Yarra Trams has some performance issues during May, which should be resolved now. You should consider coming back to us and changing that one star rating.

Used to work great, now it hardly ever let's me know when a tram is due. The stupid tram pun quotes at the bottom of the screen are all the more nauseating now. This app is a frustrating piece of digital crap. Avoid at all costs

Hi Ryan,
Thanks for your comments. You know you can just turn the quotes off right?
The performance issues have been resolved by Yarra Trams. You should consider coming back to us and changing that one star rating.
cheers,
Andy

title: Going to uninstall.
comment: Been having problems with app for weeks trying to load information very temperamental its irritating. Tram tracker app is better.

Hi Mal,

This was caused by a server issues with Yarra Trams web service. We now support the new JSON API (like TramTracker) which you can enable in the settings of the new v1.4 of Tram Hunter. Results should be lightning quick.

cheers,
Andy

title: Handy
comment: I rarely catch trams but have found this app a gem when I've needed to tram it somewhere. Very accurate travel time results within. The pop ups don't bother me personally but each to their own.

title: Great app
comment: Only drawback is pop up special event alerts.  Otherwise excellent.

title: loading...loading...
comment: loading...loading...Galaxy S4 user who used to love this app until it basically stopped working an update or two ago. Great results when it works, which is rarely...loading...loading...

Hi Dean,
This isn't a fault of Tram Hunter, but Yarra Tram's web service. Try the new version and enable the JSON API for lightning fast results!
cheers,
Andy

title: Brilliant commuter app
comment: Besides Google Maps, this is easily the most useful and user friendly commuter app on the market and it's free so astonishingly good value. Latest version however seems stuck "loading" constantly. This needs some attention.
Takes forever to load.
Hi Jesslyn, Try the new version and enable the JSON API in the settings for lightning fast results! cheers, Andy

title: Great app with silly popups
comment: great app! but... please stop with the 'special event' popups? i know to hold on to the tram as it moves - unneccessary!

Hi Dan,

You'll be pleased to know the popups are now gone. Yarra Trams started using the special event message in ways I hadn't originally intended, so we now present you a nice little message at the bottom of the screen. Hope this helps ;)
cheers,
Andy

title: Not accurate
comment: Does not show accurate times. Was at the tram stop and it showed the tram was in 37 mins. I walked to the train station and then I see a tram just stop at the tram stop. Ridiculous.

Hi Siddhesh,

Tram Hunter can't predict the trams - the data comes from Yarra Trams. They're doing lots of great work to improve this and the results will get better. One star is a bit harsh, isn't it?

cheers,
Andy

title: Tram 35 not shown
comment: Tram 35 is the free city circle tram.    For some unknown reason it does not show up on this app.     Also finding the stop that you want eg 5 is not as easy as it should be.   This app is good but needs more work.

Hi James,

Late response, I know, but the City Circle tram doesn't have departure times in Tram Tracker. Yarra Trams don't support it, so Tram Hunter can't provide it.

cheers,
Andy

One of the most used apps on my phone. Very reliable, very fast and very easy. I refresh just for a new quote while waiting for the tram.
The best on android! Good work!
Easy to use, fast and accurate, it includes diversion notices when available. The quotes on the home screen are a nice touch. Would highly recommend.
Must have accessory for tram commuters.
Simple to use and accurate. Use it almost everyday, highly recommended
Awesom application

title: Great.
comment: Amazing app. Must have
Excellent app
So far so good. Serves its purpose well for a free app.
A bit of useful information. But many features missing. For instance it would be great if you could propose a route given a starting and finishingstop
Desperately needs more information @ bigger stops. Seeing #8 as 'Leaving now' @ Flind. w/o the ability to look further down the timetable is useless.
Much faster and easier to use than the metlink app. Highly recommended for anyone who relies on Melbourne trams for getting around.
Effortless. No lag. Get on it.
Great app, and the recent update is great to select individual routes at stops.
Excellent application. Fast and easy to use.
Best one out there on any mobile platform!
Really useful when I was in Melbourne for a couple weeks, helps deal with the frustration of staring at the street corner wondering how long left lol
Great app, saved my bacon more than once. HTC legend 2.1
This is the show-down app against iOS and TramTracker, but wins. Great stuff, keep the puns rolling on! Awesome
Fantastic. Was in melb for a holiday and this was invaluable! Although a little hard to grasp as a beginner how the network works, but no fault of app
for the stops and routes that I use it for it's generally spot on and up to date
Latest update made this app so much more functional. Great job mate!
Any chance of adding pinch-zoom to the network map?
Love it , just what I was looking for
Awesome
I love this. Very handy.
Its Good. A few more settings would better, you can't scroll on tram map either
Great program! But I miss full-time table...and information about when I will arrive at my end station
I was down in Melbourne for the first time last week. Downloaded this app and it was a godsend. Thank you!
Piece of sh**. Time doesn't match.
Dislike Melbourne but can rest easy knowing I won't get lost. Thank you!
More reliable than the electronic board found at some stops. Great apps.
Great app!
Real easy to use
Must have for every Melburnian Android user.
Brilliant
Tramtracker for the droid
It would be better with full time table...
Doesn't show estimated time of arrival or any services in advance, otherwise 5 stars!
Please add ability to change the stop names in favourites and show the time that the tram is leaving not just the countdown.
Does the job but doesn't seem to handle tram schedule changes very well. So if u know of any road works, best to check metlink! ~SGS
Not always correct, needs work but gives you an idea of where to go.
Very useful. Inclusion of network map is a nice touch.
Best app for Melbourne trams. Would love to see full timetables.
Works ok Rarely gets the correct closest station though. Keep it up

title: This is really nice and I love it :)
comment: This is really nice and I love it :)

Excellent app! Tram time estimates are very accurate and the maps feature is a nice touch.

Works fantastically

Great support! Thanks for fixing dhd fc. used daily.
Awesome app, use it weekly. Would love to see notifications for when fav tram arrives at fav stop!

Excellent application for tram times.

Simply the best app in town. Recent updates were the best. Keep them coming. GPS locating is the best for a stranger in the city.
